summary: Use this API to reject a buyer's return or refund request
description:
Use this API to reject a buyer's return or refund request. Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.  Get by API Get Authorization Shop
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

The idempotency key is a unique value generated by the client which the server uses to recognize the same request. How you create unique keys is up to you, but we suggest using UUIDs, or another random string with enough entropy to avoid collisions. Idempotency keys can be up to 255 characters long.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: Return decision, available values: - REJECT_REFUND: Seller rejects the refund request - REJECT_RETURN: Seller rejects the return request - REJECT_RECEIVED_PACKAGE: Seller rejects the received package - REJECT_REPLACEMENT: Seller rejects the replacement request
Seller's reason to reject buyer's return request. Please use the Get Reject Reasons endpoint to obtain a list of rejection reasons.
Seller's comment on the rejection decision. This is where a seller will provide more information about rejecting the request.
List of images provided by the seller to support their decision to reject the return request.

children.description: Image URI obtained from the Upload Product Image API.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

error_codes.message: An invalid request parameter was passed. Please check that you have the correct parameter type(s) and format.
reverse reason not match action type
reverse reason not match reason type
request has been transferred to platform operator
forbid process receive for FBT order
reverse backend call downstream kitex error or reps is nil
Aftersales has been approved and cannot be rejected.
